description: Non-Material Amendment to planning permission ref: 75111/APP/2020/1955, dated 15-04-2021 (Site clearance and preparation, including the demolition of remaining buildings, and the redevelopment of the site to provide: a new data centre (Use Class B8), a HV Sub-Station, works to the highway, car parking, cycle parking, associated infrastructure, enclosures and necessary physical security systems, hard and soft landscaping (including works to the River Crane) and ancillary uses, as well as associated external works (Amended by NMA application ref. 75111/APP/2022/3012 dated 21-11-22)) to remove Condition 13 (North Hyde Gardens Enhancement Details).
site_name: Land at Bulls Bridge Industrial Estate
decision_conditions: The Non-Material Amendment hereby approved removes Condition 13 (North Hyde Gardens Enhancement Details) attached to planning permission ref: 75111/APP/2020/1955, dated 15-04-2021.
The Non-Material Amendment hereby approved should be read in conjunction with the Non-Material Amendments previously approved, including:-
- Application ref. 75111/APP/2023/3024, dated 30-10-23, which approved amendments to Condition 2 (Accordance with Approved Plans), including amendments to Data Centre Block 1.

- Application ref. 75111/APP/2022/3012, dated 21-11-22, which approved amendments to the description of development, Conditions 2 (Accordance with Approved Plans), 8 (Materials and Details), 9 (Landscape Scheme), 10 (Green Roofs and Walls), and 16 (Sustainable Water Management); and removed Conditions 7 (Bus Depot/Garage), 11 (Canal Access Ramp Details), 28 (Emission Mitigation Strategy), and 29 (Gas Fired Back-Up Generator Mitigation).
- Application ref. 75111/APP/2022/2049, dated 10-08-22, which approved amendments to the trigger points of Conditions 31 (Contamination), 33 (EA - Remediation) and 35 (
